tutorials.title: DataFlow Tutorial: 'Hello World!'
tutorials.description: This simple DataFlow will introduce you to a few concepts, including entering in a table using the Table Editor Module and looping over rows in a table.

tutorials.title: DataFlow Tutorial: Image Processing
tutorials.description: This tutorial will show some examples of Image Processing capabilities that one can execute with DataFlows.

tutorials.title: DataFlow Tutorial: Lunch Recommender Slack App
tutorials.description: If you"re bad at deciding what to have for lunch, the good news is that we can automate this easily in a Composable DataFlow!

tutorials.title: WebApp Tutorial: DataIntegrity Workbench
tutorials.description: This tutorial will help you build a full-stack WebApp in Composable.

tutorials.title: DataPortal Tutorial: Online Delivery App
tutorials.description: In this tutorial, we will create a DataPortal that will be used as the back-end for an online (web or mobile) delivery application.

tutorials.title: WebApp Tutorial: Creating a Full Stack WebApp
tutorials.description: This tutorial will help you build a full-stack WebApp in Composable.

tutorials.title: Introduction to DataFlows
tutorials.description: The Composable DataOps Platform is a modern, full-stack data operations and integrated development environment for developing data-intensive applications.

tutorials.title: Building Advanced Web Services
tutorials.description: This video reviews how to use DataFlows as web services

tutorials.title: Automating Recurring Reports
tutorials.description: This video demonstrates how to quickly author a DataFlow to created an automated recurring report.
